rules_text:
Flying
Growth 4 [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, put a growth counter on this if it doesn’t have four or more growth counters on it.)[/i]
Angelic Knight gets +1/+2 and has lifelink as long as it has four or more growth counters on it.
Remove four growth counters from Angelic Knight: Regenerate Angelic Knight.
